title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Haleluiah, aw Haleluia, Amen, 14
Han thlir ilangin 224
Harsatna tinreng hnuaia leng kan ni 384
He dam chhung buaithlak takah hian 467
He khawvel dam lai thlaler chhumpui zing hnuaiah hian 144
He khawvel hriat ngai loh muanna min pe la 423
He khawvelah hlim leh muanga ka thut laiin 514
He leiah thiante nen hlimin 568
He thu hi darh vel se mihriang awmna piangah 354
He thu ropui ril hle 375
Hebrai mi sal thingthi kha i hmu em 416
Hetah hian nunna tui a luang 442
Hetah lungngaih kan tuarin 571
Hetah mikhual chauh ka ni 485
Hla mawi sak duh tak mai ka nei 76
Hla taka khaw dur leh ruahpui sur 482
Hla taka mi thim Pathian thu awih lote 350
Hlau suh ka awmpui che 435
Hlau suh la Pathianin a veng ang che 570
Hlau suh Pathian i phaw 431
Hlim la Isua ropuina hliahtu kha 191
Hlim takin i chawimawi ang u kan remna Lal lo piang hi 86
Hlimin Lalpaah lawm ula 429
Hlimin lawm rawh u Tlantu a lo kal ta 228
Hlimna ni ropui chu a eng 95
Hmanah Eden huan thianghlim hmun mawi leh nuam takah khan 578
Hmanah Kaisar lal lian rengpui 117
Hmangaih zual che ka duh 428
Hmangaihna hrui vuanin 569
Hmangaihna in nuam kan tan a buatsaih chu 470
Hmanlai Farawa bawihte kha 20
Hming dang zawng zawng aiin 164
Hnam tin hnenah thu puan tur chu kan nei 341
Hneh theih loh nun ka nei 400
Hosana ti zelin aw Haleluia Amen 116
Hotu pakhat chu damna kawng zawt tura 369
Hrehawmna leh buaina piah saw 347
Hremhmuna ka awm lo hi 420
Hriat chianna hlu ber Isua ka ta 415
Hring nun kan zin kawngah hian 508
Hringmi hun hi tui luang angin 555
Huana Isua rum hre rengin 195
Hun a danglam rorelna ni ropui 249
Hun kha leh chen min kaihruaitu 511
Hunte an inher liam zel a 554
